history.proof: intros. qsimpl use: list_assoc_In. destruct (list_assoc x l) eqn:Eq. + exists y. split. * reflexivity. * qsimpl use: list_assoc_In,list_assoc_eq. qsimpl use: list_assoc_In,list_assoc_eq. hfcrush depth: 3. + hfcrush depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (x : X) (l : list (X * Y)), match list_assoc x l with | Some y => In (x, y) l | None => ~ In x (map fst l) end" on hypothesis of type "In x (map fst l)".
Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (x : X) (y : Y) (l : list (X * Y)) (x' : X), x = x' -> list_assoc x' ((x, y) :: l) = Some y" on hypothesis of type "list_assoc x l = Some y".

In environment X, Y : Type eq_X_dec : eqdec X H2 : forall (x : X) (y : Y) (l : list (X * Y)) (x' : X), x = x' -> (if eq_X_dec x' x then Some y else list_assoc x' l) = Some y H1 : forall (x : X) (l : list (X * Y)), match list_assoc x l with | Some y => In (x, y) l | None => In x (map fst l) -> False end x : X l : list (X * Y) H : In x (map fst l) y : Y Eq : list_assoc x l = Some y Unable to unify "list_assoc x l = Some y" with "In (x, y) l".
[Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet * is not finished.

original: intros. intros H. split. - apply list_assoc_In in H. destruct (list_assoc x l) eqn:Eq. + exists y. split. * reflexivity. * apply list_assoc_eq in Eq. apply Eq. + contradiction. - intros [y [H1 H2]]. apply list_assoc_In. rewrite H1. apply H2.
